conversation.Name: Female1
conversation.Text: Excuse me, sir. Can you please tell us why there is a delay with the train?

conversation.Name: Female2
conversation.Text: We've been waiting here for quite some time.

conversation.Name: Conductor
conversation.Text: I apologize for the inconvenience. There seems to be a technical issue with the train engine.

conversation.Name: Female1
conversation.Text: Is there an estimate for when the issue will be resolved?

conversation.Name: Female2
conversation.Text: We don't want to miss our connecting train.
